org.forgerock.openig.log

Interface LogSink

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsoleLogSink, FileLogSink, Logger, NullLogSink

    public interface LogSink
    Receives and handles log entries.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String LOGSINK_HEAP_KEY
      Key to retrieve a LogSink instance from the Heap.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isLoggable(String source, LogLevel level)
      Returns true if the entry may be logged based on its source and/or level.
      void log(LogEntry entry)
      Logs an entry.

    • Field Detail

      • LOGSINK_HEAP_KEY

        static final String LOGSINK_HEAP_KEY
        Key to retrieve a LogSink instance from the Heap.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • log

        void log(LogEntry entry)
        Logs an entry.
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry to be logged.

      • isLoggable

        boolean isLoggable(String source,
                 LogLevel level)
        Returns true if the entry may be logged based on its source and/or level. This does not guarantee that the entry will in fact be logged.
        Parameters:
        source - the object and/or event related to the log entry.
        level - the logging level of the log entry.
        Returns:
        true if the entry may be logged.
